import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header'; const Profile = () => { const skills = [ 'React Native', 'UI/UX Design', 'Python', 'Google Cloud', 'C Programming', 'C++ Programming', 'Finance Analysis', 'GitHub', 'Deep Learning', 'Full Stack Development', 'Communication', 'Problem Solving' ]; const badges = [ { name: 'Code Master', color: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #FFD700, #FFA500)' }, { name: 'AI Explorer', color: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #8A2BE2, #4B0082)' }, { name: 'Team Player', color: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #00FF00, #008000)' }, { name: 'Quick Learner', color: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #00BFFF, #0000FF)' }, ]; const skillProgress = [ { skill: 'React Native', level: 80 }, { skill: 'Python', level: 75 }, { skill: 'UI/UX Design', level: 60 }, { skill: 'Deep Learning', level: 50 }, ]; return (
{/* Left Profile Section */}
{/* Profile Card */}
DR

Deepak Ranjan Sahoo

deepakranjan148@gmail.com

{/* AI Career Assistant */}

🤖 AI Career Assistant

Your profile strength: 75%

Recommended: Add 2 more projects

Skill to learn: Advanced React

{/* Right Content Section */}
{/* About Section */}

About

I'm currently pursuing my Master of Computer Applications (MCA) and building a strong foundation in software development. My journey in tech began with curiosity and has grown into a passion for creating real-world solutions. I enjoy working on challenging projects and continuously learning new technologies to enhance my skills.

{/* Skills Section */}

Skills

{item.skill} {item.level}%
))}
{/* Achievements & Badges */}

{badge.name}

))}
); }; export default Profile;
